title: Model Comparison Tool - Physics Models
description: Interactive MicroSim for comparing multiple physics models (Impetus, Common Sense, Newtonian) against various test cases. Students observe side-by-side predictions and actual results to understand how scientific models are evaluated and selected.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Physics
Scientific Modeling
History of Science
Critical Thinking
learningObjective: Enable learners to actively compare multiple models against various test cases, building understanding of how scientific models are evaluated and selected.
prerequisites: Familiarity with velocity and acceleration concepts
